data.name: Dead Pets Unleashed
data.detailed_description:
This is what we’ve been working towards. The big gig. The new manager. This is how Dead Pets makes it big.





Work. Band practice. Write songs. Book the next gig. Keeping the band together. I can manage all this… right?





We’ve been through hell and back to get here. Playing together for 10 years despite our differences, I know we have what it takes.



Dead Pets is a slice of life, management-lite, narrative game about music and friendship. Playing as Gordy, you’ll go to band practice, manage Gordy’s finances and wellbeing, as well find time to earn enough money to cover rent.

From the creators of Welcome to Elk, dive into the demon world of New Void City, and give your childhood dreams one last chance.



It’s time to dream big, grow up and rock out!
data.about_the_game:

Dead Pets is a slice of life, management-lite, narrative game about music and friendship. Playing as Gordy, you’ll go to band practice, manage Gordy’s finances and wellbeing, as well find time to earn enough money to cover rent.

data.short_description: Struggling punk band, Dead Pets, are still looking for their breakthrough after almost 10 years. Gordy has big plans for the group, but when you turn 30, life starts to get in the way. Dead Pets Unleashed is a narrative, slice of life and management-lite game; get ready to unleash your inner demon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Triple Topping Games ApS Dead Pets© 2022

content_descriptors.notes:
Content Warning: Dead Pets Unleashed will contain a major storyline relating to sexual harassment. We are working with a consultant with this to ensure the storyline is handled in a sensitive way, and there will be tools implemented for the player to ensure their comfort and safety while playing. 

This does not occur in the demo but will occur in the full game.
